analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xc8d22616905c3221418f0fabd02b6c97d65c6350.sol:
	Contract BFX has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xc8d22616905c3221418f0fabd02b6c97d65c6350.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/41/0xc8d22616905c3221418f0fabd02b6c97d65c6350.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/41/0xc8d22616905c3221418f0fabd02b6c97d65c6350.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xc8d22616905c3221418f0fabd02b6c97d65c6350.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
